member_organisations:
We have only legal persons as members of our organisation. All the members are dealing with consumer affairs. The list is available here: 
http://www.pateretajs.lv/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=4&Itemid=3&lang=lv
eu_initiatives: New Deal for Consumers, European Commission Recommendation on Collective Redress, Transition from fossil fuels to alternative energy solutions, District heating systems, Energy povery observatory
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: European Consumer organisation (BEUC), European Association for the Co-ordination of Consumer Representation in Standardisation AISBL (ANEC), Latvian NGO alliance
relevant_communication: Participation in expert meetings organised by European Consumer Organisation (BEUC) and preparing the reports of European Consumer Consultative Group and European Economic and Social Committee.
goals__remit: Protect the rights and lawful interests of Latvian consumers.
